__e: This isn't just one of those things where a sailor picks up a girl for just one day.
I'm a sailor who spent all his life at sea... and knows nothing, nothing about life... or ladies.
And I was wondering if you could help me since you're the closest thing to a sailor I know.
Come here, I want you to meet a real clean-cut sailor .
You're a fine looking sailor, my young friend.
The sailor's a friend of mine.
